description: FastAPI route handlers for managing notes; provides CRUD operations for notes resource with user authentication and database interactions.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router instance used to define routes for notes.

methods.name: list_notes(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to list all notes belonging to the current authenticated user.

methods.name: create_note(note: schemas.NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new note for the current user.

methods.name: get_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))
methods.description: Retrieve a specific note by its ID, ensuring it belongs to the current user.

methods.name: update_note(note_id: int, patch: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))
methods.description: Update the title or content of an existing note owned by the current user.

methods.name: delete_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))
methods.description: Delete a note owned by the current user.

ctags.name: create_note
ctags.pattern: /^def create_note(note: schemas.NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.Us/
ctags.signature: (note: schemas.NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.pattern: /^def get_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(au/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))

ctags.pattern: /^def list_notes(db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_curre/

ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(note_id: int, patch: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int, patch: schemas.NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: models.User = Depends(auth.get_current_active_user))
